bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhong ji 腫疾 , swelling ailment. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry lu zhi 麋脂：主癰 腫、惡瘡、死肌，寒風濕痹，四肢拘緩不收，風頭腫氣，通腠理 , “It controls obstruction-illness with swelling, malign sores, dead muscles/flesh, cold, wind, moisture blockage, cramps of the four limbs so that they cannot be pulled in, wind head, and qi swelling . It penetrates the interstitial structures”.
